Linda Sokhulu bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa
Na 2014, ọ nwetara nhọpụta na nhọpụta ịnye awọdụ agba nke iri dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Malite na 2004, Sokhulu gosipụtara agwa ka"Cleo Khuzwayo" na  Generations
N'afọ 2013, Sokhulu mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ, Felix, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka nne nke onye na-eto eto bu onye na-akpọ Sasofon
A họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na SAFTA na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Ihe nkiri ahụ nwetakwara ihe nrite na Durban International Film Festival, bụ ebe a kọwara ya dị ka "onye na-asọ mpi na Hollywood blockbuster ọ bụla"
Na 2007, o gosipụtara agwa dị ka "Nomathemba" na Soap bụ Ubizo: The Calling
Na 2008, o gosipụtara ka "Pamela" na Sokhulu & Partners
A mụrụ Sokhulu na Septemba 13, 1976 na Durban, mana ọ nọrọ afọ ntolite ya na Umlazi
Anne's Diocesan College na Hilton, KwaZulu-Natal nso Pietermaritzburg (1990 ruo 1993) tupu ọ gaa Cambridge College na 1994 wee mụọ ejiji na Technikon Natal
